text: The Black Viper is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. Griffith and Wallace McCutcheon Sr.The Black ViperThe Black Viper and stars Edward Dillon, George Gebhardt, and Mack Sennett. ==Actors== * Edward Dillon as Mike * George Gebhardt as Viper * Mack Sennett as Rescuer * D. W. Griffith as Rescuer * Anthony O'Sullivan as Gang Member ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American silent movies Category:1908 drama movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith Category:Movies directed by Wallace McCutcheon Sr. Category:American drama movies
title: The Black Viper
